page.title: 16CLUBS IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: { CLUBS IN WOODHALL SPA There is no age group which is without a club.Babies go with their mothers to a mother and toddler group in W.Spa.Under 3-5 years can go to a playschool held in the morning or activity workshop in the afternoon. School age children can join clubs at school or other organised groups. Brownies for girls 7-10 & Cubs for boys 8-10 are available,so is the Girls' Brigade.Children of any age,but capable of swimming 50 metres can join the W.Spa Sharks.Older children from 14yrs can meet at the Youth Club or at Young Conservatives. Sporting types have tennis in addition to consider.Adults have a range of sporting, social interest and religous clubs which include Tennis,Golf,Garden -ing,Snooker,Hockey,Football,Cycling, W.Is, over 60's Bowls,Mothers Union.
